rationale: 'really high' modifies 'alert', not a risk-adjective of the virus.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: The segment uses the intensified alert phrase 'on really high alert'.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.
